attributes.action: Hedgehogs be protected animals under the Wildlife & Countryside Act.
attributes.additional_details:
Stop numbers of hedgehogs twindling to low or nearing extinction levels by loss of habitat caused by house building.
With so many deaths of over 100k surely not so much house building required and loss of countryside. Protect countryside
attributes.background: Stop loss of habit to all wildlife House building firms to consider habitat lost to hedgehogs and rehome as with bats and newts etc.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550379
